1. Subject + Verb + Direct Object + Indirect Object.
2. Direct Object + (Subject as a prefix)-Verb + Indirect Object.
The sentence is incorrect because  it does not conform to either pattern. It uses the word order with subject in the beginning as a standalone word, but it marks the subject as a prefix (u-) to the verb (mynary).
